summary: Comprehensive testing of café menu application completed. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with one modal interaction issue in admin dashboard.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay blocking form interactions, preventing item creation
ui_bugs.details: Dialog overlay intercepts pointer events, making form submission difficult

passed_tests: Backend: All 20 API endpoints working (100% success)
Customer menu loads with 115 items across 15 categories
Category filtering works correctly (tested Lassi category)
Today's specials section displays 1 special item
Admin login flow complete (OTP send → verify → JWT token)
Admin dashboard loads with correct stats (115 total, 115 available, 1 special)
Real-time updates work between admin and customer views
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal overlay z-index issue in AdminDashboard Add New Item dialog to enable proper form interactions. The dialog opens correctly but overlay blocks form submission.
